statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ -3 \\ -3 \\ 0 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -3 \\ -3 \\ 0 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 0 \\ 0 \\ 0 \\ -8 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -9 \\ 3 \\ 3 \\ 0 \\ -24 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 8 \\ 6 \\ 6 \\ 0 \\ 56 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -4 \\ -2 \\ -1 \\ -2 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
